page.title: 19Law and Order.
page.content: The area is covered by The North Yokshire Polce. The local village policeman from Sleights and policemen from Whitby Police Station patrol the district to keep a check on the houses and farm, caravan sites and enforce the law. When there is need the nearest Magistrate's Court is in Whitby. The North Yorkshire Forestry Commission also have rangers patrolling the moorlands, forestry, streams, rivers and forest trails, particularly in summer when there is a higher risk of fires starting accidentally. The nearest Fire Brigade covering the area is based in Whitby, and there is also cover from Robin Hood's Bay. The Yorkshire Rivers Authority is the licensing authority for fishing permits in the area.
